name: PlusPort
overview:
E-learning

PlusPort creates, develops and designs web-based customised training. We immerse ourselves in any desired theme and ensure that your employees are optimally trained with effective learning modules such as interactive exercises, videos and game elements. Finally, we ensure together with you that the training is accepted and used.

Academy

The PlusPort Academy provides a complete solution for centrally and conveniently purchasing, offering and organising training and courses. With this system you can plan, control costs, track certification, link with your other systems and much more.

Safety training

Our mission is to train your employees as effectively as possible. To do so, we increasingly use e-learning. The great advantage of this method is that participants can be trained much more quickly and at a low cost. In addition, our interactive e-learning training makes learning theory fun and much easier.

Besides the development of custom training we have a standard portfolio available. This training is specifically aimed at safety certification.
